name: Villain Monologue simulator
description:
This is it. You've finally got the world at your mercy!
There are three brave heroes in front of you, but you can annihilate them easily!

The only problem: the evil villain code requires you to give a long monologue before you can begin your attack!
Use the keyboard to type your monologue!

After a while, the heroes will get bored and will start attacking you unprovoked!
UNACCEPTABLE!
Use the arrow keys to dodge these attacks until your monologue is finished!
